reviews.review: Great game if you want to kill your friends, playing killer is also fun I guess.

El juego es bueno, si es recomendado pero en cada parche, actualizar es un martirio, demora mucho.
This game is a really fun and team based experience if you like stealth and making funny moments happen
The most toxic player base to ever exist. 10/10 game would recommend.
Gioco pieno di bug ma che Ã¨ divertente giocato in gruppo

One of  my favorite games. Suits different play styles- is great if you are an offensive or defensive kind of player. I love the teamwork aspect and co-op with friends is always fun. Character customization is also improving as there is new content coming out almost every other week. Most definitely would recommend!

If you are tired of fair play, and that old meta where you try to outdrew someone before they shot you. Well, here you go! I find playing survivor a challenge as I am at a disadvantage, and I have to use my wits/skills to attempt to get out. Also, it is essential that your fellow players can understand the "we" concept. However, it breaks up the same old routine.
Better graphics than the console version
This is a great survival game, it is even better if you play with friends in a custom match or in a public match, go ahead and buy it, unless you have no friends or you are scared easily

Dead by Daylight ist ein super Spiel. Ich bin seit Stunde Eins dabei und habe daher auch alle Ã„nderungen mitbekommen.

Mein einziger Kritikpunkt ist das neue Endgame:
SchlieÃŸt der Killer die Luke, beginnt das Endgame und der Survivor steht unter Zeitdruck einen der zwei AusgÃ¤nge zu Ã¶ffnen, sonst wird er dem Entitus geopfert. Nun sind die AusgÃ¤nge aber selten so weit voneinander entfernt, dass man es alleine schafft, einen zu Ã¶ffnen. Der Killer sieht die Lichter am Ausgang und muss sich nur so lange die Zeit dort vertreiben, bis der Countdown des Endgames abgelaufen ist.

Seit das Endgame dazu kam, ist der SpaÃŸfaktor bei mir (Survivor) auf jeden Fall gesunken, da man als letzter Ãœberlebender auf der Map kaum mehr die Chance hat, zu entkommen. Wenn man nicht in diese Situation kommt, ist das Spiel auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen und macht auch weiterhin sehr viel SpaÃŸ!

Having put a couple hundred hours in this game I can say it's quite fun and enjoyable.  I recommend playing with friends who have experience with it if you've never played.  It' has a pretty steep learning curve and when you're new the killer seems really overpowered, but after you get some experience you realize hard it is for them.  Over all fun game.

i spent 235 hours on this game and enjoyed a lot of time on it but it became increasingly difficult over time
to ignore devs bad decisions regarding balance and new features. To put it simply, i found this game fun as long
 as you discover it with friends but, it became stale after a while.
